i1.name: Whisper
description: {{sbc|Innate - Death In 4 Acts:}} '''Jhin's''' [[basic attack]]s consume [[ammunition]] for 4 rounds. He will {{tt|reload|Jhin is unable to declare basic attacks during this time.}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds [[out of combat]]. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.

'''Jhin's''' final round attack will {{tip|critically strike}} and deal {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|3|key=%|15 to 25|1 to 11}} of the target's {{sti|'''missing''' health}}}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}. This critical strike will occur versus [[structures]] but deals only {{as|{{critical damage|50|add=true}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Every Moment Matters:}} '''Jhin''' gains {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|key=%|4;5;6;7;8;9;10;11;12;14;16;20;24;28;32;36;40;44|displayformula = 3%+1% per level up to 9, then+2% up to 11, then+4% up to 18}}|attack damage}}{{ft|{{as|(+ {{fd|0.4}}% per 1% critical strike chance)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed)}}|{{as|(+ 40% of his critical strike chance)}} {{as|(+ 25% of his '''bonus''' attack speed)}}}} {{sti|ad|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
Additionally, {{tip|critical strikes}} grant '''Jhin''' {{as|10%|movement speed}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.4}}% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.
i1.notes:
* The penalty to '''Jhin's''' {{as|critical damage}} also reduces the base damage ((100 + 100){{times}}0.75 rather than 100 + (100{{times}}0.75) and stacks with other sources (i.e {{ii|Infinity Edge}}) ((100 + 100{{times}}1.25){{times}}0.75).
** This penalty does not affect {{ai|Curtain Call|Jhin}}.
* The 4th attack cannot be canceled by '''Jhin''' himself.
* The 4th attack versus a structure is classified as a critical strike.
* The attack damage multiplier stacks additively with {{bi|Dragon Slayer|Dragon Slayer's}}.
* ''Every Moment Matters' '' bonus {{as|AD}} will benefit from any amount of {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}, even in excess of an amount that would usually reach the attacks per second cap ({{fd|2.5}}).
** The maximum modifier without attack speed is 84%.
*** 44% base modifier at level 18.
*** 40% from critical strike chance on account of the 100% cap.
*** [[Attack speed#Reducing attack speed|Attack speed slows]] will only affect '''Jhin's''' bonus attack damage from his passive and will ignore his attack speed as it is fixed.
* Attack damage reductions apply before the multiplier causing them to be stronger against '''Jhin''' than advertised or versus other champions.

q1.name: Dancing Grenade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' launches a canister at the target enemy, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}. The canister then bounces to up to three additional enemies beyond the first, dealing them the same damage. Each enemy it kills increases its damage by 35% of the '''base''' damage.
''The damage will also increase if '''Jhin''' kills the target the grenade last bounced off.''
q1.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the canister from bouncing.

• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 60% AP)

e1.name: Captive Audience
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Jhin''' periodically [[stock]]s a ''Lotus Trap'' charge, up to a maximum of 2.
{{sbc|Passive - Beauty in Death:}} {{tip|Takedown|Takedowns}} on enemy {{tip|champions}} summon a free ''Blooming Lotus Trap'' under them.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' places a ''Lotus Trap'' at the target location which {{tip|Stealthed Trap|stealths}} and arms after 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting a small area of {{tip|sight}} in and around it. The ''Lotus Trap Blooms'' upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming {{tip|sight|revealed}} for 4 seconds.

''Blooming Lotus Traps'' {{tip|slow}} enemies within by 35% for 2 seconds before detonating, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies caught in the explosion. ''Lotus Traps'' deal 65% damage against non-champions and {{tip|champions}} who have been struck by another ''Lotus Trap'' in the last 1 second.
e1.notes:
* The ''Lotus Trap'' will stop upon encountering a {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.
* ''Beauty in Death'' does not trigger after killing a {{tip|clone}}.
* The reveal debuff is named [[File: Caught Out.png|20px|link=]] ''Caught Out''.
** This debuff is shared between ''Captive Audience'' and {{ai|Curtain Call|Jhin}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 120% AD) (+ 100% AP)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ 78% AD) (+ 65% AP)
